page.title: 17SCHOOLS IN HIPPERHOLME
page.content: In 1648{Hipperholme Grammar School}was founded.Now 337 years on,in September 1985 it is going private.It will cost Â£500 a term.You must pass examination to get in.It has always been a boys school but now it will take girls too. On the archway leading to the Grammar School are inscribed the words 'Remember those who in battle upheld the Honour of this School 1914-1919' On the other side of the arch is a Memorial to Maynard Percy Andrews MA Headmaster,Captain of the West Riding 4th Regiment who fell in battle near Ypres,France August 14th 1915. {Hipperholme Infants School}celebrated its centenary in 1985 and{Lightcliffe {C.of.E. Primary School}is 118 years old. There is also a small private school in Hipperholme.
